content: zipper the penguin crochet pattern by abbys crochet plushies copyright © 2025 do not copy reproduce or distribute this document you may sell finished toys made with this pa cid 425 ern with credit to abbys crochet plushies tools and materials  crochet hook size 3 5 mm  8 ply yarn blue yellow green white black  12 mm safety eyes  polyester fiberfill  yarn needle scissors s cid 415 tch marker sewing pins abbrevia cid 415 ons round s round s flo front loop only single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease invisible decrease … x n repeat s cid 415 tches within parentheses n cid 415 mes n a total of n s cid 415 tches make up that round notes 1 i use magic rings to start off my projects if you don t know this method you can chain 2 and make the single_crochet in the second chain from the hook 2 i use the invisible decrease technique when decreasing 3 this pa cid 425 ern is crocheted in con cid 415 nuous spiral rounds do not join rounds or turn your work unless instructed otherwise 4 i used the yarn under technique for this project 5 invisible fastening off makes the work neater and involves taking the yarn tail through the front to back of the next s cid 415 tch then down through the back loop of the previous s cid 415 tch and pulling cid 415 ght © abbys crochet plushies 2025 instruc cid 415 ons head and body in blue round 1 start 8 single_crochet in a magic_ring 8 round 2 increase in all 8 sts 16 round 3 1 single_crochet 1 increase x 8 24 rnds 4-6 single_crochet in all 24 sts 24 round 7 5 single_crochet 1 increase x 4 28 rnds 8-10 single_crochet in all 28 sts 28 round 11 6 single_crochet 1 increase x 4 32 rnds 12-14 single_crochet in all 32 sts 32 insert the safety eyes between rounds 8 and 9 about 3-4 visible s cid 415 tches apart start stuffing round 15 7 single_crochet 1 increase x 4 36 rnds 16-18 single_crochet in all 36 sts 36 round 19 8 single_crochet 1 increase x 4 40 rnds 20-22 single_crochet in all 40 sts 40 round 23 9 single_crochet 1 increase x 4 44 rnds 24-26 single_crochet in all 44 sts 44 round 27 10 single_crochet 1 increase x 4 48 rnds 28-30 single_crochet in all 48 sts 48 round 31 1 single_crochet 1 decrease x 16 32 round 32 16 decrease 16 round 33 8 decrease 8 fasten_off and close embroider the whites of the eyes and the eyebrows in black © abbys crochet plushies 2025 beak in yellow round 1
